content.query:
CREATE TABLE dbo.fact_quote
(
    id BIGINT NOT NULL,
    ticker NVARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    [date] DATE NOT NULL,
    [open] FLOAT NULL,
    [close] FLOAT NULL,
    high FLOAT NULL,
    low FLOAT NULL,
    volume BIGINT NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(ticker),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);
